Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Dawn Ward
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Dawn Ward.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Dawn Ward
